Description.Text:
Property Location
A stay at Millennium Broadway Hotel - Times Square places you in the heart of New York, steps from Broadway and Times Square. This 4-star hotel is close to Rockefeller Center and Macy's.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 626 air-conditioned guestrooms. Your room comes with a pillowtop bed. Wireless Internet access (surcharge) is available to keep you connected. Private bathrooms with shower/tub combinations feature complimentary toiletries and hair dryers.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Take advantage of recreation opportunities such as a 24-hour fitness center, or other amenities including wireless Internet access (surcharge) and concierge services. Additional amenities include gift shops/newsstands, wedding services, and tour/ticket assistance.

Dining
Enjoy a meal at a restaurant, or stay in and take advantage of the hotel's room service (during limited hours). Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a business center, limo/town car service, and express check-in. Event facilities at this hotel consist of conference space and meeting rooms. Self parking (subject to charges) is available onsite.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 4 PM Check-out time is 11 AM
Enjoy a meal at a restaurant, or stay in and take advantage of the hotel's room service (during limited hours). Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

The preferred airport for Millennium Broadway Hotel - Times Square is New York, NY (LGA-LaGuardia).

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Message.Text:
Essential Information:
Mandatory resort fee of approximately 26-30 USD per room per day to be paid directly to the hotel. Applicable from 01/Apr/2019 to 31/Mar/2020

No amendments or name changes can be made to this booking once it is confirmed.

Essential Information:
Mandatory resort fee of approximately 26-30 USD per room per day to be paid directly to the hotel. Applicable from 01/Apr/2019 to 31/Mar/2020

No amendments or name changes can be made to this booking once it is confirmed.

Essential Information: Room 1

No amendments or name changes can be made to this booking once it is confirmed.

Hotel Tariff Notes: No date, name and room change allowed. Bookings including children will be based on sharing parents bedding, no separate bed for children is provided unless otherwise stated. For all reservations of 5 nights or more, once the Guest has checked in, early check out will require at least 72 hours’ prior notice (failing which there will be an early departure charge equivalent to 3 nights’ full accommodation charge for the room booked). For example, for a 5 night stay the earliest the Guest can check out is day 3 or otherwise s/he shall incur the early departure charge. Facility Fee will be paid directly at the hotel
